entree.name: Smoked Paprika & Chorizo Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Grapes & Sherry Cream
entree.description:
Marinated pork tenderloin seasoned with smoked paprika, cumin, garlic, & cori&er. Searred on the grill or pan-fried to medium-rare for optimal tenderness.
Fried potatoes / Baked potatoes / Salad
We recommend this

appetizers.name: Southwestern napoleons with lump crab > new item!
appetizers.description:
Layers of light lump crab meat, bean & corn salsa, & our h&made flour tortillas.

main_courses.name: Jerk rotisserie chicken with fried plantains > new item!
main_courses.description:
Tender chicken slow-roasted on the rotisserie, flavored with spicy & fragrant jerk sauce & served with ried plantains & fresh mango. Very spicy.
Fried potatoes / Baked potatoes / Salad
We recommend this dish
main_courses.name: Shrimp sate kebabs with peanut sauce
main_courses.description:
Skewers of shrimp marinated in lemongrass, garlic, & fish sauce then grilled to perfection. Served with spicy peanut sauce & jasmine rice.
Fried potatoes / Baked potatoes / Salad
